citation: Fishing (Licence Ownership and Interest) Registration (Fees) Regulations 2022 (Tas)
text:
Fishing (Licence Ownership and Interest) Registration (Fees) Regulations 2022

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Fishing (Licence Ownership and Interest) Registration Act 2001 .

30 May 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JOANNE PALMER

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Fishing (Licence Ownership and Interest) Registration (Fees) Regulations 2022 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on 6 June 2022.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations –
        Act means the Fishing (Licence Ownership and Interest) Registration Act 2001 .

4. Fees
    The fees specified in Schedule 1 are prescribed as the fees payable under the Act in respect of the matters to which they relate.

SCHEDULE 1 - Fees

Regulation 4

Item  Matter  Fees (Fee units)  1.  Application under section 7 of Act for registration  66  2.  Application under section 10 of Act to cancel or vary entry in register (other than change of address)  47  3.  Application under section 14 of Act for replacement record of original entry in register  142  4.  Provision of copy of an entry in, or an extract from, register  15  5.  Provision of list of entries in the register –      (a) list of up to 200 entries;  20    (b) each additional 200 entries, or part thereof  10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 3 June 2022

These regulations are administered in the Department of Natural Resources and Environment Tasmania.
